entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
